ReviewText: Really surprised by the quality of these for the price. Bought 2 to test out and will probably buy more. Sound quality is excellent, and the range of flexible inserts helps to get a good fit. The detachable cable is a great idea as the cables and connectors tend to be the first to go. We are using them for in-ear monitors at our church and they have been well received by those who will be using them regularly.Was in contact with their support to get an actual invoice and their service was amazing, very responsive and thorough.Can highly recommend, based on our experience so far.

ReviewerName: Less than 2 months and the right ear has on and off hiss and crackle. That's unfortunate because they sound good for the price but I guess you get what you pay for with its durability
ReviewText: Really amazing value for Money
Don't fall out Very good audio quality

I have bought 2 of these now, their amazing sounding IEMs for the price it will change how you listen to your music, also great for gaming. i have owned audio products from MONSTER, SONY and SKULLCANDY that cost 3-4 times more and still doesn't achieve the clarity and sensation of having a subwoofer in your head.

The quality of sound you get from these IEMs are suitable for monitoring in a live situation. I would get the comply foam tips to improve its isolation but it definitely punches above its weight in sound quality. I would 100% recommend them.The cable could be redesigned to include an adjuster for the Y connector. It is currently WAY too low on the cable.

This is my first IEM, so I do not have another IEM to reference and compare this musical apparatus to, but it definitely beats your standard earphone in sound quality and price! The build quality is impressive for the price as well. Lows could have been a bit more prominated, and the highs can be a little too penetrating. But don't allow those minor inconveniences to disway you from purchasing one. A great budget friendly IEM to step you into the world of how music should really sound.

Ist oft nur ein kleines durchsichtiges R√∂hrchen, macht aber extrem viel aus was die Tragbarkeit angeht.Eine S√§ngerin mit sehr kleinen Ohren hatte allerdings Probleme mit diesem Modell und ist auf ein anderes Fabrikat gewechselt. Der Rest (8 Personen) kam gut damit klar. Man sollte sie halt keine 2 Stunden durchgehend drin lassen, da wirds dann schon unangenehm. Das trifft aber auf alle IEMs zu, die nicht custom molded sind.

Every other earbud I've tried hurt.  So did these, but when I replace the ear cushions with the correct size (4 or 5 included) they got very comfortable.  Wasn't the case for several other brands that I tried which also came with a variety of covers.  I don't know why, but I'm not complaining.  Sound very good, too.They arrive well-packaged in a neat little white box.  Look well-constructed.  For twenty-one smackeroos, you get great value with these.  I'm considering ordering another pair while I know I still can.  I've been listening via them for four hours - no pain.  Finally, I found a good, comfortable, compact travel 'phone.I'm accustomed to Hifiman HE-400i and Massdrop Sennheiser HD-58X Jubilee.  I use Schiit Modi 2U DAC and Magni 2U Amp.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on 18 November 2023
ReviewText: June 3 2020:What I like is that they are awesome monitor headphones. It comes with 4 earbuds to adjust to ear sizes. It cables coming from the drivers do contour behind to your ears. I had to add velcro loop so I can cinch it closer to my head. The only thing that I would say is that I does stick out a bit for not being custom. So for the price & sound quality it‚Äôs awesome. I only have been using it for a few days. What I have researched is that the drivers will adjust after a few usage. I usually use in ear buds & the volume level is about 60% on my laptop. Now with this KZ ZSN volume level is 40% clean & Crisp.

This is my first set of in-ear monitors, so I don't really have a baseline for judging the sound quality. I was previously using regular Bluetooth wireless ear phones, which are OK for practicing to a click or a playback through my phone, but don't have a way to connect to recording equipment.These sound great & with the addition of foam ear tips, block out external sounds to isolate the music coming through the in-ear monitors. I use these all the time when I practice to a playback. I also use them with DAW software to do simple audio editing at times of day when listening through speakers is impractical. I definitely recommend these as a good value, especially at this price.***Edit***I bought a second pair, I like them so much.

I own some decent over-ear cans (Audio Technica ATH-50x) as well as some higher end Shure multi-driver in-ears.  These little guys hold their own against those much more expensive options.  I picked these up to monitor audio while doing video shoots.  The sound isolation is fantastic as is the clarity of the sound being produced.
